009
010package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
011
012import imagingbook.lib.filters.GenericFilter;
013import imagingbook.lib.image.access.ImageAccessor;
014import imagingbook.lib.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
015
016/**
017 * This class implements a 5x5 Nagao-Matsuyama filter, as described in
018 * NagaoMatsuyama (1979).
019 * 
020 * @author W. Burger
021 * @version 2013/05/30
022 */
023
024public class NagaoMatsuyamaFilter extends GenericFilter {
025        
026        public static class Parameters {
027                /** Variance threshold */
028                public double varThreshold = 0.0;       // 0,...,10
029        }
030        
031        private final Parameters params;
032        
033        private static final int[][] R1 =
034        {{-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
035         {-1, 0}, {0, 0}, {1, 0},
036         {-1, 1}, {0, 1}, {1, 1}};
037        
038        private static final int[][] R2 =
039        {{-2,-1}, {-1,-1},
040         {-2, 0}, {-1, 0}, {0, 0},
041         {-2, 1}, {-1, 1}};
042        
043        private static final int[][] R3 =
044        {{-2,-2}, {-1,-2},
045         {-2,-1}, {-1,-1}, {0,-1},
046                  {-1, 0}, {0, 0}};
047        
048        private static final int[][] R4 =
049        {{-1,-2}, {0,-2}, {1,-2}, 
050         {-1,-1}, {0,-1}, {1,-1},
051                  {0, 0}};
052
053        private static final int[][] R5 =
054        {        {1,-2}, {2,-2},
055         {0,-1}, {1,-1}, {2,-1},
056         {0, 0}, {1, 0}};
057        
058        private static final int[][] R6 =
059        {        {1,-1}, {2,-1},
060         {0, 0}, {1, 0}, {2, 0},
061                 {1, 1}, {2, 1}};
062        
063        private static final int[][] R7 =
064        {{0,0}, {1,0},
065         {0,1}, {1,1}, {2,1},
066                {1,2}, {2,2}};
067
068        private static final int[][] R8 =
069        {        {0,0},
070         {-1,1}, {0,1}, {1,1},
071         {-1,2}, {0,2}, {1,2}};
072        
073        private static final int[][] R9 =
074        {        {-1,0}, {0,0},
075         {-2,1}, {-1,1}, {0,1},
076         {-2,2}, {-1,2}};
077        
078        private static final int[][][] subRegions =
079                {R2, R3, R4, R5, R6, R7, R8, R9};
080        
081        // ------------------------------------------------------
082        
083        public NagaoMatsuyamaFilter() {
084                this(new Parameters());
085        }
086        
087        public NagaoMatsuyamaFilter(Parameters params) {
088                this.params = params;
089        }
090        
091        private float minVariance;
092        private float minMean;
093        private float minMeanR;
094        private float minMeanG;
095        private float minMeanB;
096        
097        // ------------------------------------------------------
098
099        public float filterScalar(ScalarAccessor image, int u, int v) {
100                minVariance = Float.MAX_VALUE;
101                evalSubregion(image, R1, u, v);
102                minVariance = minVariance - (float) params.varThreshold;
103                for (int[][] Rk : subRegions) {
104                        evalSubregion(image, Rk, u, v);
105                }
106                return minMean;
107        }
108        
109        void evalSubregion(ScalarAccessor ia, int[][] R, int u, int v) {
110                float sum1 = 0; 
111                float sum2 = 0;
112                int n = 0;
113                for (int[] p : R) {
114                        float a = ia.getVal(u+p[0], v+p[1]);
115                        sum1 = sum1 + a;
116                        sum2 = sum2 + a * a;
117                        n = n + 1;
118                }
119                float nr = n;
120                float var = (sum2 - sum1 * sum1 / nr) / nr;     // = sigma^2
121                if (var < minVariance) {
122                        minVariance = var;
123                        minMean = sum1 / nr; // mean
124                }
125        }
126        
127        // ------------------------------------------------------
128        
129        final float[] rgb = {0,0,0};
130        
131        @Override
132        public float[] filterVector(ImageAccessor ia, int u, int v) {
133                minVariance = Float.MAX_VALUE;
134                evalSubregionColor(ia, R1, u, v);
135                minVariance = minVariance - (3 * (float) params.varThreshold);
136                for (int[][] Rk : subRegions) {
137                        evalSubregionColor(ia, Rk, u, v);
138                }
139                rgb[0] = (int) Math.rint(minMeanR);
140                rgb[1] = (int) Math.rint(minMeanG);
141                rgb[2] = (int) Math.rint(minMeanB);
142                return rgb;
143        }
144        
145        
146        void evalSubregionColor(ImageAccessor ia, int[][] R, int u, int v) {
147                //final int[] cpix = {0,0,0};
148                int sum1R = 0; int sum2R = 0;
149                int sum1G = 0; int sum2G = 0;
150                int sum1B = 0; int sum2B = 0;
151                int n = 0;
152                for (int[] p : R) {
153                        final float[] cpix = ia.getPix(u + p[0], v + p[1]);
154                        int red = (int) cpix[0];
155                        int grn = (int) cpix[1];
156                        int blu = (int) cpix[2];
157                        sum1R = sum1R + red;
158                        sum1G = sum1G + grn;
159                        sum1B = sum1B + blu;
160                        sum2R = sum2R + red * red;
161                        sum2G = sum2G + grn * grn;
162                        sum2B = sum2B + blu * blu;
163                        n = n + 1;
164                }
165                float nr = n;
166                // calculate variance for this subregion:
167                float varR = (sum2R - sum1R * sum1R / nr) / nr;
168                float varG = (sum2G - sum1G * sum1G / nr) / nr;
169                float varB = (sum2B - sum1B * sum1B / nr) / nr;
170                // total variance:
171                float totalVar = varR + varG + varB;    
172                if (totalVar < minVariance) {
173                        minVariance = totalVar;
174                        minMeanR = sum1R / nr;
175                        minMeanG = sum1G / nr;
176                        minMeanB = sum1B / nr;
177                }
178        }
179
180}
